Package de.arnomann.martin.blobby.sound

Class SoundPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.arnomann.martin.blobby.sound.SoundPlayer
  • public class SoundPlayer
extends Object
    A class for playing sound. Sound has to be in the OGG Vorbis format.

    • Method Summary

      Creates a new instance of the sound class.

        public static void initialize()
        Initializes the sound player.

      • createSound

        public static Sound createSound​(String name)
        Creates a new instance of the sound class.
        Parameters:
        name - the path to the sound file.

      • playSound

        Plays a sound from a path.
        Parameters:
        name - the path.
        Returns:
        the played sound.

      • playSound

        public static void playSound​(Sound sound)
        Plays a sound from a sound instance.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound to play.

      • stopAllSounds

        public static void stopAllSounds()
        Stops all sounds.

      • stopSound

        public static void stopSound​(Sound sound)
        Stops a specific sound.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound to stop.

      • stopAndDeleteSound

        public static void stopAndDeleteSound​(Sound sound)
        Stops a specific sound. It can not be played again afterwards.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound to stop and delete.

      • destroy

        public static void destroy()
        Destroys the sound player. This will stop all sounds.

      • isInitialized

        public static boolean isInitialized()
        Returns whether the sound player is initialized or not.
        Returns:
        true if the sound player is initialized, false otherwise.
